Guren sends out a wave of [[chakra]], which then turns into an almost impenetrable red crystal wall, given the fact that it repairs itself when damaged. Only [[Shino]]'s [[Secret Technique: Insect Cocoon|enhanced]] insects were capable of weakening the wall enough for [[Kakashi]] to finally destroy it with his [[Lightning Cutter]].
